name: Subversus Interactive
tag_list: games, 3d, mobile, iphone, ipad, perspectiverse, virtual-reality, augmented-reality, gyroscope
overview: Subversus Interactive creates immersive 3D mobile entertainment experiences and game engines. Games powered by the homegrown “Perspectiverse Engine” enable new paradigms of interaction between users, their mobile devices, and the physical world.
